sentences.sentence: Small early-flowering buttercup with shiny yellow flowers of western North America.
sentences.translation: 北美西部的一种小形的早花毛茛，花黄色、有光泽。

sentences.sentence: I continued working at the Buttercup, making plans for the restaurant I would open.
sentences.translation: 同时我继续在小黄花餐厅工作，计划着自己要开的饭店。

sentences.sentence: I had my first job at a local diner called the Buttercup Bakery when I was 22.
sentences.translation: 我第一份工作是在当地一家叫小黄花面包房的餐厅工作，那年我22岁。
